task.title: Create the Cloud Administrator User
task.shortdesc: After your cloud is running and DNS is functional, create a user and access key for day-to-day cloud administration.

ul.li: cloud services must be installed and registered.

context.note: This is where you would begin using the admin role, if you want to use that feature.
context.b: To create a cloud admin user

stepresult.note: This creates an admin user in the built-in 'eucalyptus' account. The admin user has full control of all aspects of the cloud. For additional security, you might instead want to create a new account and grant it access to a more limited administration role. See the Identity and Access Management (IAM) Guide for more information.
